mapper.insert: insert into sys_permit(pid, tc_code, tc_name, tc_url, tc_order, tc_type) values (#{m.pid}, 0, #{m.tc_code}, #{m.tc_name}, #{m.tc_url}, #{m.tc_order}, #{m.tc_type}null)
mapper.update: update sys_permit set pid = #{m.pid}, 0, tc_code = #{m.tc_code}, tc_name = #{m.tc_name}, tc_url = #{m.tc_url}, tc_order = #{m.tc_order}, tc_type = #{m.tc_type}null where id = #{m.id}
